DESCRIPTION: QB UNDER CENTER, NO RB/FB/H IN BACKFIELD (EMPTY LOOK).
QB IN SHOTGUN, ALL BACKS SPLIT OUT (EMPTY).
QB AT PISTOL DEPTH WITH NO BACK DIRECTLY BEHIND (EMPTY VARIANT).
ONE BACK DIRECTLY BEHIND QB UNDER CENTER (ACE / DOT).
ONE BACK UNDER CENTER, SHADED TO STRONG SIDE GUARD/TACKLE.
ONE BACK UNDER CENTER, SHADED TO WEAK SIDE GUARD/TACKLE.
QB IN GUN, ONE BACK DIRECTLY BEHIND AT 6â€“7 YDS (CLASSIC PISTOL).
ONE BACK OFFSET TO STRENGTH IN SHOTGUN (KING = BACK STRONG).
ONE BACK OFFSET AWAY FROM STRENGTH (QUEEN = BACK WEAK).
ONE BACK OFFSET TO FIELD SIDE.
ONE BACK OFFSET TO BOUNDARY SIDE.
ONE BACK OFFSET BUT TIGHT TO QB (MIDPOINT / INSIDE ALIGNMENT).
TRADITIONAL I: FB AT 4 YDS DIRECTLY BEHIND QB, TB DIRECTLY BEHIND FB AT ~7.
I WITH FB SHADED TO TE/FORMATION STRENGTH, TB DIRECTLY BEHIND.
I WITH FB SHADED AWAY FROM STRENGTH, TB DIRECTLY BEHIND.
TWO BACKS OFFSET BEHIND EACH TACKLE AT SAME DEPTH (CLASSIC PRO SET / SPLIT).
TWO-BACK UNDER CENTER, STRONG BACK CLOSER TO LOS (NEAR), OTHER DEEPER.
TWO-BACK UNDER CENTER, WEAK BACK CLOSER TO LOS (FAR), OTHER DEEPER.
TWO BACKS SPLIT EVENLY TO EACH SIDE OF QB (CAN BE UNDER OR GUN).
TWO BACKS ON EITHER SIDE OF QB IN SHOTGUN (SPLIT GUN).
2-BACK GUN WITH PRIMARY BACK STRONG (FULLBACK/H TO STRENGTH).
2-BACK GUN WITH PRIMARY BACK WEAK.
TWO BACKS GUN, NEAR BACK TIGHTER/DEEPER TO STRENGTH.
TWO BACKS GUN, FAR BACK AWAY FROM STRENGTH.
ONE BACK DIRECTLY BEHIND QB, SECOND OFFSET TO STRONG SIDE.
ONE BACK DIRECTLY BEHIND QB, SECOND OFFSET TO WEAK SIDE.
QB UNDER OR GUN, TB DEEP, FB/H OFFSET AS LEAD INSERT (CLASSIC POWER LOOK).
THREE BACKS IN TRIANGLE BEHIND QB (FULL HOUSE / T).
FULLBACK DIRECTLY BEHIND QB, TWO HALFBACKS OFFSET BEHIND TACKLES (WISHBONE).
ONE DEEP BACK, TWO WINGS JUST OFF TACKLES (T / Y-BONE STYLE).
QB IN GUN WITH THREE BACKS AT SAME DEPTH AROUND HIM (DIAMOND).
QB AT PISTOL DEPTH, THREE BACKS STACKED/ANGLED BEHIND IN DIAMOND RELATIONSHIP.
